price: Tampoco creyeron [en el Mesías] y manifestaron contra María una calumnia gravísima [acusándola de fornicadora].
arabic: وَبِكُفۡرِهِمۡ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ عَلَىٰ مَرۡيَمَ بُهۡتَٰنًا عَظِيمٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wabikuf'rihim waqawlihim ʿalā maryama buh'tānan ʿaẓīman
